resources.string: Accessibility permission is required for the app to function properly.
Permission is granted. The app can track your typing speed now.

Welcome to Alertness Monitor! This app is part of a scientific study, which focuses on tracking users\' keyboard usage during the day. During the first week, the app will send you a notification every day to complete a brief questionnaire about how you have experienced your own keyboard usage. The second week you will also be shown an overview of the data that the app has collected and you will also be asked to answer the same daily questionnaire. If you do not receive a notification within 24hours after installation, please let us know.
Portrait of the researchers that organise the study: Tilman Dingler and Tonja Maschulla
"This study is conducted by Katri SÃ¤ily and Aku Visuri at the University of Oulu. In case you have questions, please contact us at ..."

"By pressing accept, you allow Alertness Monitor to anonymously collect app and keyboard usage data. All data will be securely stored on a server in compliance with European data protection laws (BGBl. I S. 2325). All the keyboard data will be encrypted before sending it to the server so nobody can see exactly what you have written. Logs will only be uploaded when you are connected to WiFi to prevent any upload cost. Your data will only be used in the context of our research and will never be shared with third parties. You can withdraw from the study at any moment by simply uninstalling the app. Thanks! And have fun with the tasks!
No connection to our servers - are you connected to the Internet?

Without permission to access your data, the app can not track your behaviour and therefore does not fulfill the purpose of this study. If you still wish to participate in the study, please click accept.
We still need to collect some basic information from you
After saving your info you will be redirected to the onboarding pages. If you wish to change your info after pressing save, you will need to reinstall the app.
In order to continue using the app, make sure that battery optimization is NOT enabled and that you have given consent to collect your data.
Are you sure you want to skip the onboarding? If you click skip, you will move straight to Home screen without onboarding.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
